title: Who Needs Rain?
description: Have you ever been stuck inside because it was raining? That's what happens to a boy named Andy in Who Needs Rain? He is then visited by a cloud in his dreams and learns why rain is important. Colorful illustrations and engaging text support emergent readers. This story can be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing as well as to recognize and use interrogative sentences.
